cause.description:
The second ammendment, remeber that one, well my rights are being violated.
1. Guns don't kill people, people kill people
2. Gun laws are unconstitutional
3. Gun laws dont work, and they won't prevent the next Columbine or Virgina Tech
cause.mission: To make it legal for convicted felons to own guns.
cause.name: Let Skimp Killah own GUNS!
